RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWELTER had speed from the start three wide, dropped back a bit after a half, closed willingly three wide through upper stretch to make the lead near the furlong marker then drew off under an energetic hand ride to win as much the best. HOUSED prompted the early pace two wide, dueled through the far turn, gained the advantage at the top of the stretch then was no match for the winner while well clear for second. ONEMORANDTHECHECK set a pressured pace inside rivals into the far turn, remained a sharp threat into the stretch then faded. GIZMO'S MISSION bobbled inward at the start, was in tight a few strides after the break, checked repeatedly behind the top pair through the clubhouse turn while boxed in, split horses three wide nearing the far turn, surged to the lead at the three furlong marker, battled through the far turn then was used up. SEEING RED was no factor. THE EQUINEST settled five wide and had brief speed. PAPA CHARLES trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Onemorandthecheck
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Housed
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled 2 wide, inside, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Gizmo's Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled inward start, in tight, checked repeatedly first turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Swelter
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Hertrich III Frederick
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early, rallied 3 wide upper stretch, drew off, much the best

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Fred W. Hertrich lll & John D. Fielding

ENTRY.NAME: Seeing Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Papa Charles
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: The Equinest
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide, brief speed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE DECEMBER 12. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRIVATE LAKE settled with the second flight two wide, rallied three wide under strong handling through deep stretch and got up in the final strides. LUCKY JUNIOR sped to the lead three wide leaving the clubhouse turn, dueled down the backstretch, gained command entering the far turn, set the balance of the pace and just missed hanging on. GILES was bumped at the start, allowed to settle then finished determinedly four wide. YOUVESAIDITALL broke outward bumping GILES at the start, trailed into the far turn then found his best stride late in the two path. JACK'S ADVANTAGE vied for the lead for six furlongs then weakened. STRIKE A BEAT set the pace along the inside into the first turn, gave up a narrow advantage before a quarter, battled with the runner up down the backstretch, kept pressure on that one into the stretch and weakened late. GEH SCHNELL was outrun. TRIVISTA was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Youvesaiditall
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, bumped start, trailed, best stride late 2path

ENTRY.NAME: Giles
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, allowed to settle, finished determinedly 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Geh Schnell
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Strike a Beat
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside lead, battled backstretch, pressed to lane, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Jack's Advantage
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead 1/4 pole, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Trivista
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Junior
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead 3 wide, battled backstretch, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Private Lake
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight 2 wide, dug in 3 wide, up in final strides,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Dr. K. K. Jayaraman & Dr. V. Devi Jayaraman

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 12100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NAPA DUDE trailed for four and one half furlongs, circled his field five wide on the turn and six wide through upper stretch, made the lead near the furlong marker and drew clear under left handed urging. DESERT HIGHWAY allowed to settle, loomed boldly two wide into the stretch and finished second best. MR. CELLULAR chased the pace three wide into the stretch and was outfinished in a game effort. PRIVATE CONNIE pressed the pace two wide into the stretch and was outfinished inside rivals. NATURE OFTHE BEAST never far back, lacked racing room while five wide in upper stretch, shifted into the three path then finished evenly. DOMI was in tight at the start then no factor. FIRE KING away alertly, set the pace along the inside into the stretch then weakened. KALINBA close up along the rail, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Fire King
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Private Connie
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Cellular
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Kalinba
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Domi
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Napa Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, circled field, 5-6wide, drew clear, left handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Desert Highway
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, loomed boldly 2 wide upper stretch, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Nature Ofthe Beast
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, no room upper stretch, even finish

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CIRO THE BOSS pressed the pace two wide for a half, made the lead, set a pressured pace into the stretch, drifted o the six path despite right handed urging and drew off through the final furlong to win as much the best while taken in hand late. EL SORDO close up from the start, loomed boldly four wide on the far turn and finished second best. WHY KENNY WHY never far back, finished determinedly two wide. SAMURAI WAY allowed to settled, moved up four wide through the far turn, dropped inside at the top of the stretch then finished evenly. MOR CRAFTY failed to menace. ROUGE TU RICHES away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside for a half then weakened on the far turn. MAILS HERE pressed the pace three then two wide through the second turn and gave way in the stretch. RAISE YOU ONE was hung six wide into the clubhouse turn and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Why Kenny Why
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished determinedly 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Rouge Tu Riches
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace inside half, weakened 2nd turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Ciro the Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, half, battled 2nd turn, drifted 6path, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Mor Crafty
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Mails Here
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3-2wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: El Sordo
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, loomed boldly 4 wide 2nd turn, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Samurai Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, advanced 4 wide 2nd turn, angled inside, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Raise You One
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide early, trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 10900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 12. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAZARUS PROJECT unhurried early, circled rivals five wide through the stretch under left handed urging and was along in time. HE'S A SHOOTER away alertly, set the pace along the inside into the stretch, drifted to the four path, maintained the advantage until the final stages then couldn't handle the winner. SOUTHERN WILL never far back, found his best stride late inside rivals. MORE THAN GOOD close up from the start, offered a strong bid four wide into the stretch then was outfinished. WILE E PEYOTE vied for the lead four then three wide down the backstretch, boldly three wide nearing the quarter pole, matched strides into the stretch and faded late. EXALTED JOY passed tiring rivals. UNCLE KEVIN pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then weakened. HROTHGAR had brief speed. WHISKEY SUNRISE failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Sunrise
ENTRY.OWNER: Vickers Richard T and Pena Yendri J
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Exalted Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: He's a Shooter
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, drifted 4path, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Hrothgar
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Southern Will
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, best stride late inside

ENTRY.NAME: Lazarus Project
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, circled rivals 5w, left handed urging, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Kevin
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: More Than Good
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Romero Juan
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, bid 4 wide top lane, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Wile E Peyote
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, loomed boldly 3 wide 1/4 pole, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 21500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).). ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIGER TRAIL prompted the pace two wide into the stretch, drifted to the five path, rallied to make the lead before the furlong marker, shook clear late and just lasted under strong handling. OAKEN unhurried early, closed with a rushed two wide inside the winner and just missed. WEEKEND BUZZ sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace into the stretch, drifted to the four path then was outfinished. MASTEROFTHEHOUNDS bore out at the start, stalked the pace three wide and went evenly. ROSCO P. COLTRANE bumped at the start and failed to menace. NAMBITI was no factor. THAT'S THE WAY bobbled then was bumped at the start and failed to reach contention. OHIO EAGLE was no threat. OHIO MUNNY pressed the pace four then three wide into the turn and was through after a half. RED HOT POWER had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Weekend Buzz
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace top lane, drifted 4p, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Rosco P. Coltrane
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: That's the Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, bumped start,

ENTRY.NAME: Tiger Trail
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, rallied 5path, shook clear late, just lasted,

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Eagle
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Oaken
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed fast 2 wide, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Nambiti
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Red Hot Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Munny
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 4-3wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Masterofthehounds
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out start, vied for lead, 3 wide, evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 68. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 12 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less NotConsider ed In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHANEL SPIRIT made the lead shortly after the break, set all the pace and widened through the stretch under mild right handed urging to win as much the best. BODIL had good early speed inside rivals, offered a mild bid into the stretch and finished clear for second. SPICE ICE slow early, found her best stride late along the rail. KAT TRAX unhurried early, swung wide and had a mild late rally outside rivals. GOODNESS SAKES failed to menace. KISS VALENTINA chased the winner three wide into the stretch and weakened late. SWEET OUTLOOK pressed the pace along the inside into the turn then weakened. KERRI'S MIRACLE close up early, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Outlook
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, weakened turn

ENTRY.NAME: Bodil
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, middle move, 2 wide, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Goodness Sakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Chanel Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick lead, set pace, drew off, right handed urging, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Kat Trax
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, mild rally late outside

ENTRY.NAME: Spice Ice
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, best stride late inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Kerri's Miracle
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Kiss Valentina
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3 wide, weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Starter Allowance Purse 17600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 12 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 O r Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YOGA QUEEN broke in full stride to set all the pace, drifted out to the six path entering the stretch, was put to right handed urging, the rider switched to left handed urging inside the furlong marker, continued to drifted out to the eight path through the final stages and prevailed under strong handling. FOR THE BISCUIT with the second flight three wide, drew closer to the winner midway on the turn, was carried out to the seven path at the top of the stretch, matched strides the length of the stretch while carried out to the nine path and just missed. MITESSE allowed to settle, had a mild late rally two wide. JOLIE RULER had speed from the start, loomed boldly two wide on the turn then was outfinished. PRINCESS HALIME pressured the winner along the rail down the backstretch, dropped back on the turn then finished evenly. MISS OVER THERE well placed, failed to respond. SKY was no factor. DIVINE MARTHA trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Halime
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, dropped back turn, even finished rail

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Martha
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Jolie Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, loomed boldly 2 wide mid turn, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Mitesse
ENTRY.COMMENT: mild rally late 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Over There
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: For the Biscuit
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 3 wide, loomed boldly 6path, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Yoga Queen
ENTRY.OWNER: Willoughby Jr Jack and Clark Robert Lee
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, long drive, drifted, prevailed,
